alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:29PM EDT until June 18 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/. * At 128 PM EDT/1228 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of De Funiak Springs to 17 miles northwest of Panama City Beach to 13 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Bradford, Live Oak, Parker, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Moose Pond, Whitehead Crossroads, Allanton and Dirego Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
